verses.verse: Unto you will I <S%H7121>cry<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; be not <S%H2814>silent<s%> to <S%H2790>me<s%>: lest, if you be silent to <S%H4911>me<s%>, I become like them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>, when I <S%H7768>cry<s%> unto <S%H5375>you<s%>, when I lift up my <S%H3027>hands<s%> toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1687>oracle<s%>.

Draw me not <S%H4900>away<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, which <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to their <S%H7453>neighbors<s%>, but <S%H7451>mischief<s%> is in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> them according to their <S%H6467>deeds<s%>, and according to the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>endeavours<s%>: <S%H5414>give<s%> them after the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>; <S%H7725>render<s%> to them their <S%H1576>desert<s%>.

Because they <S%H995>regard<s%> not the <S%H6468>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, nor the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, he shall <S%H2040>destroy<s%> <S%H1129>them<s%>, and not build them up.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, because he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H4043>shield<s%>; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H5826>him<s%>, and I am helped: therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> greatly <S%H5937>rejoices<s%>; and with my <S%H7892>song<s%> will I praise <S%H3034>him<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is their <S%H5797>strength<s%>, and he is the <S%H3444>except<s%> <S%H4581>strength<s%> of his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
<S%H3467>Save<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: <S%H7462>feed<s%> them <S%H5375>also<s%>, and lift them up for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
